snippet: President Bashar al-Assad criticized British aid for rebels in Syria, but Britain’s foreign secretary, William Hague, called Mr. Assad’s view of the conflict “delusional.”
lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad criticized British aid for rebels in Syria, but Britain’s foreign secretary, William Hague, called Mr. Assad’s view of the conflict “delusional.”

headline.main: Assad and British Official Trade Verbal Blows Over Syrian Conflict
headline.print_headline: Assad and British Official Trade Verbal Blows Over Syrian Conflict
